select User.Id as u_Id,User.FirstName as u_FirstName,User.LastName as u_LastName, User.Email as u_Email,User.Phone as u_Phone, User.Cellphone as u_Cellphone,User.Program_Id as u_Program_Id,User.YearGraduate as u_YearGraduate , User.BirthDate as u_BirthDate,User.Period as u_Period, Rol.Id as r_Id,Rol.name as r_name, Program.Id as p_Id,Program.Name as p_Name,Program.Duration as p_Duration, Account.Id as a_Id,Account.Password as a_Password,Account.Active as a_Active,Account.Salt as a_Salt, Membership.Id ,Membership.Start_Date ,Membership.Receipt ,Membership.PaymentNumber , Membership.Account_Id ,Membership.Rate_id ,Membership.End_Date , Rate.Id as r_Id,Rate.Year as r_Year,Rate.Value as r_Value
From User LEFT JOIN Rol ON(User.Rol_Id=Rol.Id) LEFT JOIN Account ON(User.Id=Account.Id) LEFT JOIN Program ON(Program.Id=User.Program_Id) LEFT JOIN Membership ON(Membership.Account_Id=Account.Id) LEFT JOIN Rate ON(Membership.Rate_id=Rate.Id) Where DAY(Membership.End_Date)-DAY(NOW())<=30 AND YEAR(Membership.End_Date)-YEAR(NOW())=0 AND MONTH(Membership.End_Date)-MONTH(NOW())=0
